name: Free Email Templates
description:
Create your next email or newsletter with our free template. Each template is responsive, easy to customize, and can be edited to fit your brand.


With our customizable email templates, you don't have start from scratch. Just pick the layout you like and play around with components until you have the result you're looking for!


Edit the illustrations!

All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want using the Blush plugin!


Get the plugin

To get the best out of this collection, install the Blush plugin and edit all the doodles.
